title: Cumberland Gap National Historical Park: Join Our Friends
body: Join Our Friends          Friends of Cumberland Gap National Historical Park is a non profit group established to support the park and its programs. Becoming a member of the Friends of Cumberland Gap National Historical Park will help enhance visitor activities, preserve history, fund special events and projects, provide educational outreach, maintain trails and facilities, protect the park's natural beauty, and much more!  Join the Friends of Cumberland Gap Natinonal Historical Park and help support your national park! Contact via email or send correspondence to: Friends of Cumberland Gap National Historical Park 2116 Cumberland Avenue Middlesboro, KY 40965 Check out the Friends of Cumberland Gap National Historical Park website!
